page.title: 11TRAFFIC
page.content: WOOTTON ST. LAWRENCE IS A VERY PEACEFUL VILLAGE.THERE IS HARDLY ANY TRAFFIC IN THE VILLAGE.THE MAIN TRAFFIC IS TAKING A SHORT CUT FROM THE ANDOVER ROAD TO THE NEWBURY ROAD.THERE IS A LITTLE POND IN THE VILLAGE AND A CHURCH.THE CHURCH HAS A NEW VICAR.THERE IS A BUS SERVICE IN THE VILLAGE.THERE IS A SHOP WHICH ALSO SERVES AS A POST OFFICE WHERE YOU CAN BUY MOST THINGS WHICH YOU WOULD NEED EVEN THOUGH IT IS RATHER EXPENSIVE.THE VILLAGE TITHE BARN HAS BEEN DEMOLISHED.THEY HAVE A VILLAGE FETE EACH SUMMER AND EASTER BANK HOLIDAYS ON THE SCHOOL FIELD BUT IT IS ONLY FOR THE VILLAGE.THE SCHOOL FIELD WAS THE VILLAGE GREEN.ON FRIDAY EVENING THEY HAVE THE CHILDRENS YOUTH CLUB.
